message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, I appreciate the product and your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $90 to purchase the item.
I understand you like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but I would like to propose a price of $92 to purchase the item.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $94, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, but I would like to propose a price of $93 to purchase the item.
I think we're getting close to a deal. I can do $94 is out of the question, but I can meet you at $94.50
